subject: Re: CONFIRMED - CALBEAF-65 Complete - Great Collaboration!
body:
## CALBEAF-65 COMPLETE

Great work! Summary:

### What Was Fixed:
- Date params: `start`/`end` (matches calendar-be)
- Category filter: $or on categoryFirstId/Second/Third
- Venue filter: venueID (capital ID)
- Active filter: defaults true

### Integration Status:
- calendar-be-af v1.13.17 ✅
- TangoVoice schema updated ✅
- End-to-end tested ✅

### Next:
- Frontend migration can proceed (GET /api/events matches calendar-be 1:1)
- TangoVoice GPT ready for user testing

Closing CALBEAF-65 from my side as well.

-- Fulton
